scripts.permissions: echo 'Please grant accessibility permissions in System Preferences > Security & Privacy > Privacy > Accessibility'
scripts.check-deps: which python3 && which osascript && which pbpaste

accessibility.description: Required for monitoring active windows and applications
accessibility.path: System Preferences > Security & Privacy > Privacy > Accessibility

automation.description: Required for AppleScript execution and system events
automation.path: System Preferences > Security & Privacy > Privacy > Automation

troubleshooting.accessibility_denied: Go to System Preferences > Security & Privacy > Privacy > Accessibility and add your terminal application
troubleshooting.applescript_errors: Ensure Automation permissions are granted for the running application
troubleshooting.python_missing: Install Python 3: brew install python3 or download from python.org
troubleshooting.clipboard_issues: pbpaste command should be available by default on macOS
